cards.title: The Sanatorium
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Choose your dude and another dude at the same or adjacent location. Your dude gets either +1 influence or +1 Huckster skill. The other dude gets –1 bullets and –1 value.

cards.title: Abram's Crusaders
cards.text: Your Deputies with a Melee Weapon have +1 bullets. Your Deputies with a Miracle have +1 influence. Noon, Boot: One of your dudes gains the Deputy keyword.

cards.title: Den of Thieves
cards.text: Your starting posse may contain up to two Grifters. Your Grifters each have their cost reduced by 1. React, Boot: When draw hands are revealed, add 1 bounty to one of your Grifters to increase your hand rank by 1. Your hand is considered illegal. Gain 1 Ghost Rock.

cards.title: Asakichi Cooke
cards.text: Noon: Discard a card. Move one of your other dudes from this location (without booting, even if booted).
cards.flavor: "When I saw what they did to that poor girl, I had to step in. She's been a daughter to me ever since." -Forster Cooke

cards.title: Emre, The Turkish Bear
cards.text: React: After any dude at this location pulls for a Technique, pull and use that value instead. Emre becomes a stud until the end of the turn.

cards.title: Michael "The Badger" Dodge
cards.text: While The Badger has a Melee Weapon, he is a stud. Shootout, Boot: Boot an opposing dude. The Badger gets –3 bullets if the opposing posse has more unbooted dudes than your posse. Pull. If the pull is not a club, the dude you booted gets –3 bullets.

cards.title: Jim Cheveyo
cards.text: While at the same location as a Spirit, Jim has +1 influence and is a stud.
cards.flavor: "I never had the patience to commune with the spirits, but they seem to like me anyway."

cards.title: Enapay
cards.text: Enapay has +2 influence during High Noon. Noon, Boot: Another dude at this location gets +1 influence.

cards.title: Danny Wilde
cards.text: Danny cannot be called out by dudes with lower influence (not even through card effects).
cards.flavor: "I've danced the Ghost Dance alongside the Paiute, rode to war with the Apache and against them. Why would I care what you think about me?"

cards.title: Dabney Scuttlesby
cards.text:
Dabney can only invent Mystical Gadgets.
Dabney can invent Mystical Gadgets and trade them to other dudes while in the town square.
cards.flavor: "It's excellently adapted to carry off superfluous bile, amend appetite, and remove habitual costiveness for just $5 a bottle."

cards.title: Ivor Hawley (Exp.1)
cards.text: If your outfit is , Ivor's cost is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0) for each Abomination in play and in any Boot Hill. React: After Ivor enters play from your hand, play up to two Hexes or Abominations from your Boot Hill. Reduce those cards' costs by 3 each.

cards.title: Deborah West
cards.text: Deborah is a stud while she is the leader (during a job or callin' out).
cards.flavor: "You don't need eyes to see how much you need help, Brother Abram. 'Ask and ye shall receive.' "

cards.title: Abram Grothe (Exp.2)
cards.text: If your outfit is , Abram's cost is reduced by the total bounty on other players' dudes (to a minimum of 0). Noon/Shootout, Boot: Unboot all your Deputies at this and adjacent locations.
cards.flavor: " 'The Lord is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?' "

cards.title: "Dead" Billy Jones
cards.text: Noon: If you control a Ranch, choose a dude with a Horse in this or an adjacent location. Move that dude to another location.
cards.flavor: "I ain't goin' near them... things. Billy can look after 'em." -Jarrett Blake

cards.title: Lillian Morgan (Exp.1)
cards.text: If your outfit is , Lillian's cost is reduced by 1 for each Horse and Ranch you control. Noon/Shootout: Play an action from your discard pile (as if it were in your hand). After the card resolves, boot a spell on Lillian or ace that action.

cards.title: Samantha "Sammy" Cooke
cards.text: Noon, Boot, Pay 1 Ghost Rock: Discard a goods card attached to a dude at this location. Sammy gains 1 bounty. If the discarded goods card was a Horse, pull. If the pull is higher than the Horse's value, attach it to Sammy instead.
cards.flavor: "If possession is 90% of the law, the other 10% is a fast horse. Now I have both."

cards.title: Sloane (Exp.1)
cards.text: If your outfit is , Sloane's cost is reduced by the number of wanted dudes you control. When Sloane enters play, unboot each of your wanted dudes. Sloane gets 1 bounty for each dude you unbooted.

cards.title: Margaret Hagerty
cards.text:
Margaret gets +3 to her Mad Scientist skill while inventing Gadget dudes.
Each Gadget dude at Margaret's location has -1 upkeep.
cards.flavor: "Madness? No. This is the only thing that makes sense."

cards.title: The Wretched
cards.text: The Wretched must be invented by a Mad Scientist. It enters play at the Mad Scientist's location (but does not attach). After The Wretched enters play, ace a dude you own and control in the same location. The inventing Mad Scientist gains 2 bounty (if still in play).

cards.title: The Extra Bet
cards.text: React, Boot: After all players ante for lowball, add 1 additional ghost rock from your stash to the pot. After you draw your lowball hand, you may discard a card from your draw hand and replace it with the top card of your deck.

cards.title: Morgan Mining Company
cards.text: This deed has +1 production for each Strike you control.
cards.flavor: "Finally! A chance to make some real money in this stinkin' cowtown." -Lula Morgan

cards.title: Quarantine Tent
cards.text: Dudes at this deed ignore all penalties to bullets, value, and influence (the penalties resume when the dudes leave this location). Controller Noon, Boot: Boot your dude at this location to unboot your outfit. You may use its abilities an extra time this turn.

cards.title: Cooke's Nightcap
cards.text: This deed has 2 control points while controlled by a player other than its owner.
cards.flavor: "Our home away from home." -T'ou Chi Chow

cards.title: Mutant Cattle
cards.text: After this card is discarded as a casualty for losing a round of a shootout, the winner pulls. If they have a dude in their posse with a value lower than the pull, they must take one casualty.

cards.title: Monte Bank
cards.text: Cannot be traded. Monte Bank's cost is reduced by 2 when attaching it to a Grifter. A dude cannot have more than one Monte Bank attached. This dude gains the Grifter keyword (after attaching).

cards.title: Wendy's Teethkickers
cards.text: React, Boot: After another player's dude goes home booted from this location, this dude gets +1 influence until the end of the turn. Unboot this dude.

cards.title: Rich Man's Guard Dog
cards.text: You may immediately play this Gadget when another player reveals an illegal draw hand. If this Gadget is invented while you are in a shootout, attach it to a dude in your posse. Cheatin’ Resolution: Pull. If the pull is equal to or higher than the value of the opposing shooter discard them, otherwise send them home booted.

cards.title: Fiery Rhetoric
cards.text: Noon Job Miracle 6, Boot: Mark the town square. If successful, this dude gets control points (until the end of the turn) equal to the number of wanted dudes controlled by other players.

cards.title: Strength of the Ancestors
cards.text: Noon Spirit 5, Boot: This dude gets +3 bullets, becomes a stud, and other players’ card effects cannot boot them or send them home booted. These effects end if this dude leaves this location (or at the end of the turn).
cards.flavor: "The journey of the warrior encompasses far more than physical strength." -Black Elk

cards.title: Phantom Fingers
cards.text: Noon/Shootout Hex 6, Boot: Choose a goods card attached to an opposing dude in this or an adjacent location. Boot it, and it loses all traits, abilities, and bullet bonuses. If it's Mystical or a Gadget, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "A flick of the wrist and they'll never know what hit them." -Ivor Hawley

cards.title: Dumbstruck
cards.text: Noon/Shootout Miracle 9, Boot: This dude cannot be booted or moved by other players' card abilities. Unboot this dude.
cards.flavor: "She can shoot a flea off a horse's ear at fifty yards... with her off hand." -Abram Grothe

cards.title: Red Horse's Tail
cards.text: Noon Spirit X, Boot: X is the value of a dude at this location. Boot that dude. Shootout Spirit X, Boot: X is the grit of an opposing dude. Send that dude home booted.

cards.title: Fire of Nanahbozho
cards.text: Can only attach to a deed. This deed gains the Holy Ground keyword. Shamans get +2 to their Shaman skill while at this deed. Noon/Shootout Spirit 10, Boot: Unboot a dude at this deed. Make another play.

cards.title: Civil War
cards.text: Noon: Choose two dudes controlled by the same player in one location. Their controller moves one of those dudes to another location (without booting, and even if booted).
cards.flavor: "I'll burn this company to the ground before I give any more of it to you!" -Lillian Morgan

cards.title: Rabbit's Deception
cards.keywords: Technique • Tao of the Jade Rabbit
cards.text: Shootout Tao Technique: If successful, send this dude home booted. If your dude was unbooted when you played this card, you may also send an opposing dude home booted. Combo if there is a stud in the opposing posse.

cards.title: A Hero's Passing
cards.text: Play only if a dude has been aced this turn. While this card is attached to your home, increase your maximum hand size by one. Discard this card when a dude you own is aced. Noon, Job: Mark your home. If successful, attach this card to your home and draw two cards.

cards.title: Tummy Twister
cards.text: While attached to a deed, this card attaches to the first dude to move here (the winner chooses in case of a tie). A dude with this card attached has +1 upkeep. Noon: Attach this card to a deed.
cards.flavor: "I ain't seen a doctor in 20 years, and I ain't gonna start now!" -famous last words

cards.title: Backroom Deals
cards.text: React: Play when an opposing dude is discarded during the Upkeep phase. That dude remains in play instead. You control them until the end of the turn. React: Play at the start of the Upkeep phase to give one of your dudes –2 upkeep until the end of the phase.
cards.flavor: "Nice to meet a Morgan who shares my interests." -Lane Healey

cards.title: Forced Quarantine
cards.text: Discard this dude at the end of the turn. Noon Job, Boot: Mark an opposing dude whose current influence, bullets, or value are lower than their printed values. If successful, boot the mark, attach this card to them, and your leader gets one permanent control point.

cards.title: Devil's Joker (Red)
cards.text: This card is used only for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. While this card is in your draw hand, your hand is illegal. Increases your hand rank by 2. Ace the joker after use.

cards.title: Devil's Joker (Black)
cards.text: This card is used only for draw hands and pulls. You choose its suit and value. While this card is in your draw hand, your hand is illegal. Increases your hand rank by 2. Ace the joker after use.
